summary: The diff shows that cart-related files were modified but NOT deleted as required. Files like CartContext.tsx, Cart.tsx, CartButton.tsx, and Payment.tsx still exist in the codebase (they appear in the MODIFIED FILES list, not REMOVED FILES). The BuildRequest explicitly requires deletion of these files, but the implementation only modified them. Additionally, the actual content changes are not visible for most files due to truncation, making it impossible to verify if cart functionality was properly removed from the code.

missing_requirements.requirement: CartContext.tsx file is deleted; No cart state management code remains in the codebase
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx appears in MODIFIED FILES list, indicating it was not deleted as required

missing_requirements.requirement: Cart.tsx component file is deleted; No cart display UI remains in the application
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx appears in MODIFIED FILES list, indicating it was not deleted as required

missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx appears in MODIFIED FILES list, indicating it was not deleted as required

missing_requirements.requirement: Payment.tsx component file is deleted; No cart-based payment initiation code remains
